tool_description: Calculates comprehensive nutritional information for recipes including calories, macronutrients, vitamins, and minerals per serving.

recipe_name.description: Name of the recipe being analyzed

ingredients_list.description: List of ingredients with quantities (e.g., '2 cups flour', '1 lb chicken breast')

servings_count.description: Number of servings the recipe produces

cooking_method.description: Primary cooking method (grilled, baked, fried, steamed, raw)

include_vitamins.description: Whether to include vitamin content analysis

include_minerals.description: Whether to include mineral content analysis

error_messages: Invalid ingredients format: Provide ingredients with quantities in standard format (e.g., '2 cups flour').
Ingredient not recognized: One or more ingredients could not be found in the nutritional database.
Invalid servings count: Provide a positive integer between 1 and 100 for servings.
Unsupported cooking method: Use recognized methods like grilled, baked, fried, steamed, or raw.
Recipe too complex: Maximum 50 ingredients allowed per recipe calculation.
usage: Provide recipe_name, ingredients_list with quantities, and servings_count. Optionally specify cooking_method and vitamin/mineral inclusion flags. Returns detailed nutritional breakdown per serving.

protein_grams.description: Protein content in grams per serving

carbs_grams.description: Carbohydrate content in grams per serving

fat_grams.description: Fat content in grams per serving

fiber_grams.description: Dietary fiber in grams per serving

sodium_mg.description: Sodium content in milligrams per serving

allergens_present.description: List of allergens detected in the recipe
